fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm upgrade report shows suite uptime
fields.request_details:
1. Ensure the suite is running normally and has been active for at least a few minutes.
2. Open the Upgrade Report in the Django admin (System > Upgrade Report).
3. Locate the Suite uptime row in the Settings section and verify it displays a non-empty human-readable duration.
4. Cross-check the value against the host uptime (for example, using `uptime -p`) to confirm it is reasonable for the current session.
